caption: Rule
name: rule
description: The rule object associated with a policy or event.

desc.description: The description of the rule that generated the event.

name.description: The name of the rule that generated the event.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the rule that generated the event.

condition.description: The rule trigger condition for the rule. For example: SQL_INJECTION.

sensitivity.description: The location in the request where the rule matched. For example: HIGH.

location.description: The location in the request where the rule matched. For example: HEADER.

match_details.description: The data in a request that rule matched. For example: '["10","and","1"]'.

rate_limit.description: The rate limit for a rate-based rule.

status_code.description: The event status code, as reported by the event source.

response_time.description: The rule response time, usually used for challenge completion time.

message.description: The description of the event, as defined by the event source.
